songs.title: Scream for Love*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics From Snippet

[Verse 1]
Late nights holding hands
Walking though the park
When I was your man
Day dreams that we had
Other broken hearts finally
Came to pass

[Bridge]
How could I
Ever be a fool and
Waste my time
Saying things are cool
When it's not right
Hiding in the truth
Still telling lies

[Chorus]
Scream for love
Every night I hear
You scream for us
Yeah I wanna
Hear you scream
Hear you scream
Every night I hear
You scream
Hear you scream

Scream for love
Every night I hear
You scream for us
Yeah I wanna
Hear you scream
Hear you scream
Every night I hear
You scream
Hear you scream

[Verse 2]
On the daily you've
Changed I tried to fall
Apart 'cause I love it so strange
You seem to fall apart but now
And when I try to leave you
Yell for me to stay but

[Bridge]
How could I
Ever be a fool and
Waste my time
Saying things are cool
When it's not right
Hiding in the truth
Still telling lies

[Chorus]
Scream for love
Every night I hear
You scream for us
Yeah I wanna
Hear you scream
Hear you scream
Every night I hear
You scream
Hear you scream

Scream for love
Every night I hear
You scream for us
Yeah I wanna
Hear you scream
Hear you scream
Every night I hear
You scream
Hear you scream
